import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'./Portfolio.css';// Custom styles for cards and images
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Portfolio=()=>{const sections=[{id:1,title:'Bedroom',imgSrc:'/image/bedroom5.jpg',link:'/bedroom'},{id:2,title:'Kids Room',imgSrc:'/image/kids1.jpg',link:'/kids-room'},{id:3,title:'Kitchen',imgSrc:'/image/kitchen1.jpeg',link:'/kitchen'},{id:4,title:'Living and Dining Area',imgSrc:'/image/living4.jpeg',link:'/living-room'},{id:5,title:'Puja Room',imgSrc:'/image/pujaroom2.jpg',link:'/puja-room'},{id:6,title:'Office',imgSrc:'/image/living2.jpg',link:'/office'},{id:7,title:'Washroom',imgSrc:'/image/washroom5.jpg',link:'/washroom'},{id:8,title:'Entrance',imgSrc:'/image/entrance.jpg',link:'/entrance'},{id:9,title:'Exterior',imgSrc:'/image/exterior1.jpeg',link:'/exterior'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Our Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:sections.map(section=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:section.link,style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card custom-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:section.imgSrc,className:"card-img-top custom-img",alt:section.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-body",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title text-center",children:section.title})})]})})},section.id))})]});};export default Portfolio;
